Allright, JP, in post 27875, you mentioned two shields around the 
_island_ that your base was on, then in post 27988, you dropped two 
water grenades on DrillBit. You're either in an island (as most of 
your posts have said so far), or on a land base. Pick one.

::FZ/The Galactors::

FZ speeds up, detecting four missiles heading for him. If he went 
full speed, he knew he could outfly them, but that wasn't neccessary. 
Without slowing down, FZ reaches behind him with his left hand, 
opening his palm and pointing the orb at the oncoming shots and 
missiles. The orb flashed, a large wall of energy flying out of it. 
The wall smashes into the missiles, detonating them and absorbing all 
but three of the laser shots, one of which misses FZ, the other two 
hitting.

FZ speeds up, knowing that he wouldn't be able to do that too many 
times. But it didn't matter; no one could go against the wishes of 
the Vok, he had first-hand experience with that.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Whoosieeees!!!!" the Supernova jet taunts, flying away from the base 
once more, outrunning the missiles heading for him. The jet largely 
ignores the laser shots, knowing that Scrap's repair system could 
take care of minor damage such as that. It turns sharply upward, 
leaving two missiles to glide down toward the shields of the base, 
spiraling to avoid most laser fire directed at them.

The Vicir/Slasys jet is hit by one of the missiles, spinning out of 
control for a second but then regaining damage.

"Supernova, we need to adjust," it says over the comm to the Galactor 
leader. The Supernova jet acknowledges, the two jets flying toward 
each other.






--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (If I'm not mistaken JP is at the old Brotherhood base.  If that's 
the case, 
> there are no rocks to jump off of)
